snippet.title: Dreadlands | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dreadlands is developed by Blackfox Studios & published by Fatshark. 

Coming in Early Access March 10, wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054690/Dreadlands/

Dreadlands is a turn based skirmish game in which you control a gang of misfits and mercenaries, battling for survival and supremacy in a lush post-apocalyptic setting. Pick your crew from one of the playable gang factions, all distinctly different playstyles, lore, and visuals.

-- Follow Dreadlands!--
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playdreadlands
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playdreadlands/
Website: https://playdreadlands.com/

-- Follow us!  --
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/fatsharkgames
Facebook: http://facebook.com/fatsharkgames
Twitter: http://twitter.com/fatsharkgames
Website: http://www.fatsharkgames.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fatsharkgames/
